name: Legacy Game Formatter
description: A profile that replicates the functionality of the original game info formatter tool.
template:
<!--LOOP:groups-->
<!--IF:latest.gameVersion-->Version: {latest.gameVersion}
<!--/IF:latest.gameVersion-->
Clean Steam Files:
<!--LOOP:latest.cleanFiles-->
[url={cleanUrl}][color=#00ff00][b]{entryName} [{platform}] [Branch: {branch}] (Clean Steam Files)[/b][/color][/url]
[size=85][color=white][b] [{platform}] [{branch}] Version:[/b] [i]{shortDate} [Build {buildId}][/i][/color][/size]
<!--/LOOP:latest.cleanFiles-->
<!--IF:latest.crackedExists-->

Cracked:
<!--LOOP:latest.crackedFiles-->
[url={crackedUrl}][color=#00ff00][b]{entryName} [{platform}] [Branch: {branch}] ({crackType})[/b][/color][/url]
[size=85][color=white][b] [{platform}] [{branch}] Version:[/b] [i]{shortDate} [Build {buildId}][/i][/color][/size]
<!--/LOOP:latest.crackedFiles-->
<!--/IF:latest.crackedExists-->

Patch notes:
<!--LOOP:items-->
[size=85][color=white][b] [{platform}] [{branch}] Version:[/b] [i]{fullDate}[/i][/color][/size]
{patchNoteUrl}
<!--/LOOP:items-->

<!--IF:history.length-->
[spoiler="Older Versions"]
<!--LOOP:history-->
[b]{entryName} [{platform}] [Branch: {branch}] Build {buildId}[/b]
<!--/LOOP:history-->
[/spoiler]
<!--/IF:history.length-->

<!--/LOOP:groups-->
